title: U.S. megatalent Matteo Jorgenson saddles up with Vingegaard, Roglič, Kuss at Jumbo-Visma
content:
Jorgenson joins Dutch team on three year-deal to add weight to calendar-dominator's classics and grand tour units.

Read the full article at U.S. megatalent Matteo Jorgenson saddles up with Vingegaard, Roglič, Kuss at Jumbo-Visma on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
